name: Multifox Plus
author: Creative Brahma

sections.description:
Multifox Plus plugin adds additonal features for Multifox. Some of the features are,

  1. Custom Header – unlimited possiblities
  2. Custom Footer – unlimited possiblities
  3. Breadcrumb customization
  4. Typography -for body, heading tags,…
  5. Custom blog listing styles
  6. Custom hooks – to place your script on any part of the site
  7. Site layout – fullwidth & boxed
  8. Custom skin – customize your site for any color tone
  9. Elementor shortcodes
  10. Other features – to top, loader,…

INSTALL THE MULTIFOX PLUS MANUALLY

  1. From the dashboard of your site, navigate to Plugins –> Add New.
  2. Select the Upload option and hit ‘Choose File’.
  3. When the popup appears, select the multifox-plus.zip file from your PC.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Contributors & Developers:

“Multifox Plus” is an open source software. The following people have contributed to this plugin.
Creative Brahma
sections.changelog:
1.1.6

* Compatible: WordPress 6.1.1 support
* Compatible: PHP 8.1 version support
* Updated: Language file
* Updated: Page pre loader with custom image / icon
* Updated: Minor design layout changes

1.1.5

* Page loader transition option updated
* WordPress 6.0.3 support

1.1.4

* Elementor full width template compatible

1.1.3

* WordPress 6.0.2 support

1.1.2

* 5 more demos added along with demo content

1.1.1

* Security update

1.1.0

* Multifox Premium Plugins support
* WordPress 5.9 support

1.0.9

* Comes with two more free demo - Fason & Taxi

1.0.8

* Comes with one more free demo - Fredie

1.0.7

* Checked WordPress 5.8.3 compatibility
* SVG image design tweaks

1.0.6

* One free demo included
* Mobile menu design tweaks
* Shop minor improvements

1.0.5

* Typography improvements
* All elementor shortcodes - New responsive control compatibility - Completed
* Carousel shortcodes issues fixes
* Tab shortcode improved with icon option
* Performance improvements
* .pot files updated

1.0.4

* Minor improvements

1.0.3

* Demo content update & shop improvements

1.0.2

* Minor improvements

1.0.1

* Improvements & bug fixes

1.0.0

* First Version
